name: Pregnancy Crisis Centers Hotline
description: National hotline service providing pregnancy crisis support and information. Offers confidential assistance to individuals facing pregnancy-related challenges, including unplanned pregnancies, pregnancy complications, and related crisis situations. Available 24/7 to provide support, information, and referrals to appropriate services.
source: Verified from multiple Kentucky government resource directories and counseling service websites
notes: This is a national hotline service that provides pregnancy crisis support and information. The service is free and confidential, offering assistance to individuals facing pregnancy-related challenges. Listed in multiple Kentucky government resource directories and counseling service websites as a legitimate crisis hotline.
